augmentations.name: Characteristic Augmentation
augmentations.description: Raises any one physical characteristic (STR, DEX, or END) by +1 permanently. Can only be taken once per characteristic.

augmentations.name: Skill Augmentation
augmentations.description: Provides +1 to a specific skill via neural or muscle interface. Must already have at least level 0 in the skill. Does not stack.

augmentations.name: Adrenal Pump
augmentations.description: Once per day, grants +2 to all physical checks (STR, DEX, END) for 1D6 rounds. Must rest after use.

augmentations.name: Dermal Armor
augmentations.description: Provides Armor 2 at all times. Counts as worn armor for stacking effects.

augmentations.name: Internal Comp
augmentations.description: Embedded computer interface with heads-up display and basic software.

augmentations.name: Vision Enhancement
augmentations.description: Infrared, low-light, and magnification vision modes. Can be toggled at will.

augmentations.name: Hearing Enhancement
augmentations.description: Enhanced auditory range and clarity. May include sound filtering software.

augmentations.name: Lung Filter
augmentations.description: Protects against most toxins, airborne diseases, and pollution. Grants +2 DM to END checks to resist.

augmentations.name: Interface Ports
augmentations.description: Allows direct neural connection to compatible computer systems.

augmentations.name: Neural Link
augmentations.description: Enables instant communication with ship systems and robotic devices.

augmentations.name: Reflex Booster
augmentations.description: Grants +1 DM to INIT and DEX-based tasks.
